xldoc.title: The Philosophy of Roger Bishop Jones
xldoc.description: Home page for the rbjones.com web site.
xldoc.keywords: rbjones logic philosophy positivism metaphysics utopia
xldoc.maintitle: The Philosophy of Roger Bishop Jones

section.title: Introduction
section.abstract: I'm not much good at writing, but I do like to think, on what generally seem to be philosophical topics, or in what might be seen as a philosophical way. What little I do write mostly ends up on this web site, invariably fragmentary and incomplete.

sbcol.subsec: New editions of Aristotle's Organon and Metaphysics in PDF and paperback.
The technical side of my research in progress can be found in THE SHED.
